title: it’s good but my Apple ID won’t work
text:
Apple ID problems can be frustrating, especially when they occur in the middle of playing a game like Among Us. If you're experiencing issues with your Apple ID while playing Among Us, it can be hard to figure out what's causing the problem and how to fix it. Here are some common issues that players have encountered and some solutions to help you get back to playing the game.
One of the most common issues that players experience is being unable to sign in to their Apple ID. This can happen for a variety of reasons, such as forgetting your password, having an outdated version of the game, or encountering a server issue. If you're having trouble signing in, the first step is to make sure that you're using the correct Apple ID and password. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it by visiting the Apple ID website and following the prompts.
Another issue that players have reported is being unable to make in-app purchases. This can be a problem if you're trying to buy new skins or pets for your character. If you're having trouble with in-app purchases, the first thing to check is that your Apple ID has a valid payment method attached to it. If your payment method is up-to-date, you may need to contact the game's support team to see if they can assist you with the issue.
Some players have also experienced issues with their Apple ID being locked or disabled. This can happen if there are too many failed login attempts or if Apple suspects that your account has been compromised. If your account is locked or disabled, you'll need to contact Apple's support team to get it unlocked. This process can take some time, so be patient and follow the instructions that Apple provides.
In some cases, players have reported that their Apple ID is being used by someone else. This can be a serious issue that requires immediate attention. If you suspect that your Apple ID has been compromised, the first step is to change your password. You should also enable two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your account. If you're still having trouble, contact Apple's support team and explain the situation.
Overall, Apple ID problems can be frustrating, but there are solutions available. By following the steps outlined above, you can get your account back in working order and get back to playing Among Us. Just remember to keep your account secure by using a strong password and enabling two-factor authentication.
If you're still having trouble, don't hesitate to reach out for help.

title: This game has to be on my top list of fav games!!!
text:
Before I started playing among us, I watched YouTube videos on among us, and the more I watched, the more I wanted to play! Now before you start playing, you might need to know that there is a lot of cussing and inappropriate language so if your Nine and under I recommend people to play with that you know, and that don’t cuss often. 

Also, have no friends??? That’s easy, just go to the little space bean figure in the top right corner and press it, once you’ve done that you go to people playing in the room and then you can send a friend request to the name tag you’re looking at.

Another way to avoid cussing is to play on quick chat, this mode is a way to communicate with people without cussing, there are many sentences in your album of quick chat which will help you play the game.
